Window

Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Support.mvc.TModel
      • Window.Storage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel, IStorage

    public class Storage
extends TModel
implements IStorage
    Contains implementation of data component of application. Instance attached to the controller responsible for storing: - The list of optional board modes - The list of optional difficulty levels - The selected board mode by which the actual game settings are generated. - The selected difficulty by which the artificial players strength is set.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

    • Field Detail

      • selectedBoardIndex

        private int selectedBoardIndex
        Stores the unique index of selected board model option. If nothing is selected than the value is "-1".

      • selectedDifficultyIndex

        private int selectedDifficultyIndex
        Stores the unique index of selected difficulty option. If nothing is selected than the value is "-1".
